newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech SPT details domestic bond, 11.3 pct.
newsitem.headline: Czech SPT details domestic bond, 11.3 pct.

text.p: The Czech fixed line telephone monopoly SPT Telecom a.s. said on Friday its planned seven-billion crown retail issue of seven-year bonds would have a coupon of 11.3 percent and be issued at par.

Josef Jurca of SPT's press department said the bonds, with a nominal value of 10,000 crowns, would be issued through Czech banks Ceska Sporitelna, Komercni Banka and Ceskoslovenska Obchodni Banka from February 6.
Sporitelna is lead manager of the issue, which will be open to all domestic and foreign investors.
